definitions.definition: To modify (a sound) so that it is no longer palatal or phonetically palatalized .
To be modified so that it is no longer palatal or palatalized.
definitions.label_groups: phonetics , intransitive , unaccusative , of a sound

main_definition: ( phonetics , transitive ) To modify (a sound) so that it is no longer palatal or phonetically palatalized .
secondary_definitions: ( phonetics , intransitive , unaccusative , of a sound ) To be modified so that it is no longer palatal or palatalized.
